defs: a long, flexible snout or proboscis, as of an elephant; the trunk.
the thigh looking like the trunk of an elephant.
an acute, infectious, communicable virus disease characterised by big, red spots on the skin, high fever, nasal discharge, etc.; a kind of measles.
